name: Eggtinction
description:
Held at Tis the Season Game Jam
You can play better if u download it The Game

"Eggtinction"  is a platform videogame in which we will have to solve a series of puzzles as we advance towards our objective: to reach the other's area. We will control both characters at the same time and our objective will be to carry out the different tasks with both of them.

Controls Features
  • Game objective: The objective of the game is to transmit a series of messages to society, criticising various issues such as pollution, climate change...
  • Mixed aesthetics: The aesthetics of the game is based on a striking Pixel Art mixed with cartoon style for all audiences and adapted to the theme.

How to play

The player's objective is to complete the different rooms, overcoming obstacles and platforms. To do so, the player will have to make use of the core mechanic, throwing the head, to be able to move through the level correctly and continue advancing.

Development team
